Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a Naval officer is found dead in an office in the Pentagon with her murder being recorded via security camera. It appears to be a simple and easy case but then the team later discover that their main suspect has died, having suffered an apparent heart attack, leading them to suspect that someone else is responsible for killing the Naval officer and as this goes on, Agent Barrett's team continue investigating the Port to Port serial killings, culminating in a shocking revelation being revealed, one that leaves all the NCIS personnel stunned.

Title: Baltimore
Synopsis: When his former partner is found dead, a possible victim of the Port-to-Port Killer, DiNozzo confronts his past as a Baltimore detective and finds himself taking a trip down memory lane as he remembers the events that led to him becoming an NCIS Special Agent.

Title: Swan Song
Synopsis: When the badly decayed remains of an NCIS Special Agent are found in a forest, the NCIS team help fellow NCIS Special Agent Erica Jane Barrett and her team investigate the killing which has links to the ongoing Port to Port serial killer case with things taking an intense turn when new evidence comes to light suggesting that the "Port to Port" killer has infiltrated the Navy Yard and therefore the NCIS agency with Gibbs and the team soon suffering a personal and devastating tragedy when a close friend becomes the killer's latest victim while Barrett and her team search for a potential witness, only to find themselves in grave danger when Jonas Cobb strikes.

Title: Pyramid
Synopsis: As Jonas Cobb, the "Port to Port" killer continues his increasingly vicious campaign of revenge against those responsible for Operation Frankenstein, the NCIS team struggle to stop Cobb once and for all but things spin out of control when Cobb takes two personnel associated with NCIS hostage, forcing the team into a deadly game of cat and mouse against Cobb as they fight to save their kidnapped colleagues before it's too late.

Title: Nature of the Beast
Synopsis: After months of working with the new SECNAV on a top-secret, undercover and very classified assignment, DiNozzo finds himself in a D.C. hospital, suffering from amnesia and also an injured arm while also carrying a NCIS badge stained with the blood of a fellow NCIS Special Agent. It now falls to Gibbs and the NCIS team with help from Doctor Rachel Cranston to find out what really happened.

Title: Restless
Synopsis: A beloved Marine is murdered at his homecoming party, prompting the NCIS team to investigate and they soon discover evidence of a botched kidnapping attempt of which the victim's adopted sister was the target but things change when the team discover that the sister is harboring secrets about her past.

Title: The Penelope Papers
Synopsis: When a naval officer is murdered, the team discover a startling connection between the victim and McGee's grandmother before they realize that the two have a connection to a project that began some thirty years ago while Jimmy Palmer struggles with his upcoming wedding.

Title: Enemy on the Hill
Synopsis: The team must find out who hired a hitman to kill a Navy Lieutenant Commander while Abby goes through a series of tests and uncovers some startling secrets concerning her own family history which leaves her stunned.

Title: Safe Harbor
Synopsis: NCIS and CGIS conduct a joint-investigation when a Coast Guard officer is shot dead during a nighttime examination of a mysterious ship with the NCIS team soon discovering that Lebanese family has been secretly stowing away on the ship and begin questioning them but some of the family are not who they claim to be. Things later take a turn for the worse when Abby discovers evidence suggesting that a potentially devastating terrorist attack is about to happen, one that if successful could completely destroy half of the Norfolk Naval Base while Tony, McGee and Ziva with Borin's help attempt to find the right woman for Gibbs.

Title: Thirst
Synopsis: When a Navy Lieutenant is found dead, the team suspects that the death was accidental but when Ducky discovers that the victim died from water intoxication, it changes from accidental to murder and the team suspect that a serial killer might be responsible.

Title: Devil's Triangle
Synopsis: The team join forces with FBI Agent Tobias Fornell when Gibbs and Fornell's ex-wife, Diane Sterling enlists their help in finding her kidnapped husband, only to discover that an attack may soon take place, sending the team into a desperate race against time to stop the attack before it's too late.

Title: Engaged Part 1
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a C-130 carrying the remains of three Marines who died fighting in Afghanistan crash lands into a field. As the team dig deeper to determine the cause of the crash, a shocking revelation soon emerges: one of the Marines whose body was supposed to have been on the plane may actually still be alive.

Title: Engaged Part 2
Synopsis: After learning that a missing Marine is alive, Gibbs and Ziva travel to Afghanistan participate in a rescue operation as they attempt to save the Marine with the entire NCIS team soon uncovering a terrible secret concerning a group of teachers involved in the school-building project.

Title: Sins of the Father
Synopsis: The body of a man is discovered in a car and the team are stunned where they find DiNozzo's father, Anthony D. DiNozzo Sr. at the scene. As a result of his father being the main suspect in a murder investigation, DiNozzo is temporarily suspended but goes against Gibbs and Vance's orders as he searches for evidence in the hope of proving that his father is truly innocent while Gibbs, McGee, Ziva, Abby and Ducky all work the case and attempt to discover what really happened.

Title: Newborn King
Synopsis: On Christmas Eve, a Navy Captain is murdered by a group of mysterious assassins, forcing the NCIS team to intervene and also protect his pregnant companion who happens to be the group's true target which eventually leads Gibbs and Ziva into an intense gunfight against the remaining assassins who will stop at nothing in abducting the pregnant Lieutenant while DiNozzo and McGee race to save their colleagues before it's too late.

Title: Housekeeping
Synopsis: While investigating the death of a naval officer, the team finally discover long-lost NCIS Special Agent Erica Jane Barrett who's been on the run for the last few months which brings them into contact with an old enemy.

Title: A Desperate Man
Synopsis: The NCIS team's efforts to find the killer of a Navy Lieutenant Commander whose body was found in an apartment is greatly hampered when her grief-stricken husband who also happens to be a Metro Police Department detective insists on being part of the investigation.

Title: Life Before His Eyes
Synopsis: During his traditional morning routine which consists of him having coffee at his local diner before heading into work, Gibbs finds himself later locked in a stand-off with someone. As such, Gibbs finds himself trapped in a life-or-death situation which forces him to question all the choices he has made during his life while flashbacks show the NCIS team working on their recent case: a dead Navy officer and a civilian on board a decommissioned Navy ship as well as a man who may be guilty of treason.

Title: Secrets
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Naval officer and discover that the victim was a member of a society of real-life everyday superheroes while the team also meet DiNozzo's ex-fiancée.

Title: Psych Out
Synopsis: A high-level security Naval reservist is found dead, forcing the NCIS team to investigate and determine if the death is really a suicide or murder.

Title: Need to Know
Synopsis: When a Navy Chief Petty Officer is murdered, the NCIS team investigate and link his death to an international arms dealer but red tape and Defense Intelligence Agency agents may ultimately prevent the team from solving the case while Ned Dorneget hopes for an opportunity to join Gibbs's team.

Title: The Tell
Synopsis: After a security breach, the SECNAV orders Gibbs and Dr. Samantha Ryan to work together to uncover the mole.

Title: The Good Son
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigative the death of a Navy Petty Officer and soon discover a possible connection between the victim and Vance's brother-in-law.

Title: The Missionary Position
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Marine who fell from the sky after being tortured with the team later discovering that a Navy Chaplain has gone missing in Colombia. Tony and Ziva later head to Colombia to rescue the Marine with Ziva's mentor later joining the investigation while back in Washington D.C., Gibbs and McGee continue pursing other leads connected to the case while Jimmy Palmer must choose who will be his Best Man for his upcoming wedding.

Title: Rekindled
Synopsis: When a fire erupts at a warehouse in Baltimore, the NCIS team head to Baltimore to investigate where they also join forces with members of the Baltimore P.D. and they soon discover that issues concerning national security are at stake while Tony reunites with a figure from his past.

Title: Playing with Fire
Synopsis: Following the attack on the U.S.S. Brewer, NCIS with help from both the United States Navy and also the Marine Corps find themselves in a huge race against time to find and stop the mastermind responsible for causing the blast while battling to stop a global crisis that threatens to compromise the safety and security of many United States Navy ships worldwide. When a similar device is found on the U.S.S. Benjamin Franklin which is docked in Italy, Tony and Ziva head to Italy to investigate and in doing so, are reunited with DiNozzo's predecessor as they conduct a search for the man responsible and stop the Benjamin Franklin from suffering the same fate as the Brewer while back in Washington D.C, Gibbs and McGee tackle other aspects of the case.

Title: Up in Smoke
Synopsis: During a routine visit to the dentist, NCIS Probationary Agent Ned Dorneget gets a shock when he discovers a bug implanted in his tooth. The investigation leads the NCIS team to a grief-stricken businessman-turned-terrorist who is seeking revenge against the Navy for his son's death.

Title: Till Death Do Us Part
Synopsis: After learning that Vance has gone missing, the NCIS team search for Vance while attempting to find Harper Dearing who is seeking revenge against the Navy for his son's death. However, Dearing's final game plan involves launching an attack with both NCIS and the Navy Yard as the targets and when it finally occurs, the lives of NCIS and its personnel including those of Gibbs and his team are all endangered.

Title: Extreme Prejudice
Synopsis: In the aftermath of the Navy Yard Bombing which has damaged buildings in the Navy Yard and also left numerous people dead and many more injured, the NCIS Major Case Response Team while struggling to cope with the aftermath of the attack find themselves along with the FBI racing to find businessman-turned-terrorist, Harper Dearing and also end Dearing's personal vendetta against both the Navy and NCIS once and for all.

Title: Recovery
Synopsis: Four months after the events of the Navy Yard Bombing, the body of NCIS's facilities manager is discovered in her car. Due to the fact that she disappeared without a trace on the day that the Navy Yard was attacked, the NCIS team begin to wonder if she played any role in the bombing but things change when acting Medical Examiner Jimmy Palmer discovers that the victim was shot which has the team realizing that the supposed accident is actually murder, prompting them to launch an investigation as they search for the killer while in the aftermath of the bombing, the team undergo psychological evaluations to determine if the attack has affected them.

Title: Phoenix
Synopsis: While on medical leave as a result of suffering a heart attack which occurred when he learnt of the Navy Yard Bombing, Ducky orders that the remains of a Navy commander whose autopsy he performed twelve years ago be exhumed after Ducky realizes that the Commander may have been murdered. As that happens, the NCIS team investigate the death of a Marine who was found dead in his apartment and as the investigation unfolds, it appears that the two deaths are seemingly connected.

Title: Lost at Sea
Synopsis: After three members of a helicopter crew wash ashore after spending four days adrift at sea, the NCIS team along with GCIS agent Abigail Borin investigate, determined to figure out what actually happened but when the missing pilot is later found dead, the team dig deeper to find out a motive for the death while Ziva challenges both Tony and McGee to a dare.

Title: The Namesake
Synopsis: A Petty Officer is found dead in the car of a millionaire, prompting the NCIS team to investigate while Gibbs is stunned when he meets an old friend of his father.

Title: Shell Shock Part 1
Synopsis: A Lieutenant in the Marine Corps who recently returned home from the Middle East is found dead after being brutally attacked and beaten, prompting the NCIS team to investigate the circumstances surrounding the Marine's death but the team soon discover that all is not what it seems and that one suspect could be linked to a terrorist group.

Title: Shell Shock Part 2
Synopsis: In the aftermath of discovering that one of their suspects is associated with a terrorist group based in Afghanistan, the NCIS team continue searching for new leads while Gibbs works with a Marine Captain suffering from PTSD in order to help them locate and stop the suspect from launching a potentially devastating terrorist attack, only to learn that the suspect has a partner while with Thanksgiving approaching, Abby's enthusiasm for the NCIS family dinner is growing and Tony is left curious upon learning that Ziva is making special plans for the opera.

Title: Gone
Synopsis: The NCIS team race against the clock when a teenage girl is kidnapped while Abby and Ziva work with the girl's friend who witnessed the kidnapping and the death of her father. As the investigation drags on and with time running out, Gibbs seeks information from a well connected woman who has questionable morals while Tony gets jealous when he learns Ziva is making plans with a mysterious man.

Title: Devil's Trifecta
Synopsis: A Seaman attempts to kill FBI Agent Tobias Fornell, only for Fornell to kill his assassin in self-defense which prompts the NCIS team at the FBI's request to come and investigate the crime scene but the team are left stunned when they soon discover that a figure from Gibbs and Fornell's past is involved in a separate investigation concerning the discovery and arrest of the person responsible for a series of identity thefts.

Title: You Better Watch Out
Synopsis: As D.C. prepares to celebrate Christmas, the NCIS team investigate the discovery of a Navy Lieutenant's husband and as they investigate, they discover that the murder could be connected to a potential counterfeiting ring with the team working alongside a Secret Service agent while Tony's father arrives to celebrate Christmas with his son.

Title: Shabbat Shalom
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when the body of a Petty Officer is found by a father and a son duo on a fishing trip but the team soon discover that the supposed "Petty Officer" in question is actually a civilian as well as an investigative journalist while Ziva gets a surprise when her estranged father who she hasn't seen in two years secretly arrives in the U.S., prompting Ziva to question her father's true reasons for being in the country in the first place although he insists he's arrived to see Ziva for a Shabbat dinner but tragedy lies in wait, threatening to change the lives of both Ziva and Vance forever.

Title: Shiva
Synopsis: Following on the events in the previous episode, the NCIS team struggle to come to terms with the incident that has left both Eli David and Jackie Vance dead and they rally to protect Ziva from any further attacks but she isn't interested in sympathy or even stopping to grieve because there's only one thing she wants more than anything in the entire world and that's revenge.
Writers: Christopher J. Waild & Gary Glasberg & Scott Williams

Title: Hit and Run
Synopsis: The bodies of a Lance Corporal and his civilian girlfriend are discovered in a car that has gone over the edge and the team originally assume that it's nothing more than a tragic accident but it quickly becomes a murder investigation when Ducky determines that the female passenger was dead long before the car ever went over the edge. As the NCIS team investigate the circumstances surrounding the case, Abby finds herself recalling some painful memories of her first case that she investigated as a child in New Orleans.

Title: Canary
Synopsis: Following a cyber attack on MTAC that resulted in the death of an undercover NCIS agent, the NCIS team attempt to break an infamous hacker who could hold the key to tracking down the most-wanted cyber-terrorist in the world.

Title: Hereafter
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the death of a Marine who was assigned to Quantico, Vance, still on leave and struggling to come to terms with his wife's tragic death discovers unexpected personal information that leaves him and causes him to question everything he thought he knew about his family and his marriage.

Title: Detour
Synopsis: The team investigate the death of a Petty Officer who seemingly committed suicide and when Ducky and Jimmy are in the process of bringing the body back to NCIS for an autopsy, they're both kidnapped by a woman and her team who appear to be after the body while upon realizing that the Medical Examiner van hasn't arrived back at NCIS, Gibbs begins to suspect that something sinister may be afoot and that the supposed Petty Officer may not be who he appears to be with the team later launching a rescue operation to save both Ducky and Jimmy before it's too late.

Title: Prime Suspect
Synopsis: A media frenzy surrounding an unidentified criminal prompts Gibbs's barber to question his estranged son's involvement and ask for Gibbs's help in ruling out his son as a prime suspect but the case takes a turn when the team discover that the original killer is dead, leading them to suspect that a copycat may be responsible for the recent killings while Ned Dorneget returns.

Title: Seek
Synopsis: The team investigates the death of a Marine who specialized in K-9 bomb detection who died after being shot in Afghanistan after learning from his wife that the victim sent her a message stating that he feared for his life and as such, Gibbs and McGee along with the victim's dog, Dex, head to Afghanistan to uncover the truth while Vance asks for the team's assistance as he interviews nannies who could look after his children.

Title: Squall
Synopsis: Following the aftermath of a huge storm, the NCIS team head to the U.S.S. Borealis to investigate the death of the ship's doctor with tensions building when McGee discovers that his estranged father was on board during the incident.

Title: Chasing Ghosts
Synopsis: When a Navy reservist returns home to find her husband missing and her living room covered in blood, she turns to the NCIS team to find him and bring him home but as the team conduct their investigation, they soon discover all is not what it seems while Tony becomes increasingly concerned for Ziva and believes that she's planning a risky move to avenge her dead father.

Title: Berlin
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigates the murder of a Mossad officer which occurred in Virginia, Tony and Ziva head to Berlin, Germany instead of Rome, Italy as they attempt to track down leads that could lead Ziva to Ilan Bodnar.

Title: Revenge
Synopsis: As the NCIS team continue searching for Ilan Bodnar, Tony and Ziva both attempt to come to terms with the physical and psychological wounds sustained from the car accident they were in with Ziva's own search for Bodnar eventually leading her to a final showdown against her former friend.

Title: Double Blind
Synopsis: In the aftermath of Ziva killing Ilan Bodnar who was responsible for the deaths of Eli David and Jackie Vance, NCIS finds itself under investigation from a Department of Homeland Security agent and the consequences that emerge could prove damaging or even life changing for everyone involved, especially Gibbs and his team while the NCIS team investigate when a Petty Officer claims that he's being followed with the team wondering if the Officer's claims are a result of paranoia, tied to national security or something else altogether.
Writers: Christopher J. Waild & Steven D. Binder

Title: Damned If You Do
Synopsis: With Gibbs having been arrested, the Department of Homeland Security's investigation into NCIS grows wider, ultimately placing the future of NCIS and its agents in jeopardy. While the NCIS team suspect that the investigating agent is looking to capitalize on Gibbs's arrest, they soon discover that there's more to the case than originally suspect and they soon find themselves investigating the case concerning a murdered Navy SEAL.

Title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
Synopsis: Tragedy strikes when an explosion at a hotel in Washington D.C. claims the life of a figure well-known to NCIS. As the NCIS team launch a search to find those responsible for the bombing, a new terrorist group called the Brotherhood of Doubt emerges and their main targets are Gibbs and his former team.

Title: Past, Present, and Future
Synopsis: As Gibbs, McGee and the rest of the NCIS team tackle other aspects in the current case while also hunting down wanted terrorist Benham Parsa and Parsa's terrorist group, the Brotherhood of Doubt who have left nothing but a trail of death and destruction in their campaign against Gibbs's team, Tony finds himself heading to Israel in the hope of finding Ziva before it's too late.
Writers: Gary Glasberg & Scott Williams & Gina Lucita Monreal

Title: Under the Radar
Synopsis: After an explosion at a Navy Lieutenant's apartment kills a civilian, the NCIS team search for the missing Lieutenant and soon discover that the Lieutenant who also washed out of flight training is planning on exacting revenge against his former classmates who are on a Navy ship, the classmates in question preparing for their first assignment while McGee struggles to deal with the potential fallout that could occur after realizing that his NCIS credentials have gone missing.

Title: Anonymous was a Woman
Synopsis: When a young woman is found dead, the NCIS team along with Susan Grady investigate but are shocked to discover that the woman who's supposed to be a Marine Sergeant is in fact an impostor and also an immigrant originally from Afghanistan. Gibbs and McGee later travel to Afghanistan to visit a local Afghan woman's shelter that Mike Franks secretly supported for years, only to face harsh resistance from locals.

Title: Once a Crook
Synopsis: As the team investigate the murder of a Petty Officer, Tony who's suffering from sleep deprivation that has been triggered as a result of Ziva's abrupt and permanent departure from the NCIS team soon realizes that the main suspect in the case involving the murder of a Petty Officer could be connected to a fifteen-year-old case that he investigated while working as a cop for the Baltimore Police Department.

Title: Oil and Water
Synopsis: A suspicious explosion on board an oil rig which results in the death of a Marine has NCIS reuniting with the Coast Guard Investigative Service (CGIS), most notably CGIS agent Abigail Borin as they seek to investigate and determine who is responsible for the explosion while the NCIS team find themselves being targeted by a mysterious prankster.

Title: Better Angels
Synopsis: After Gibbs leaves mid-case to help his father reconnect with a former Luftwaffe pilot, Tony and McGee argue over who should run lead on the team’s investigation into the murder of a Marine Sergeant.

Title: Alibi
Synopsis: When a Petty Officer dies in a hit and run while out jogging near Quantico, it seems like an easy case for the NCIS team but things take a turn when a former FBI agent turned lawyer confides in Gibbs that her client, a Navy Petty Officer has a confidential alibi while McGee grows suspicious of Tony's strange behavior.

Title: Gut Check
Synopsis: A briefing being held in MTAC is interrupted when it's discovered that SECNAV Sarah Porter has been bugged, sending Gibbs, Tony and McGee on a manhunt to investigate the circumstances of the event with the case soon having issues of national security at stake and even murder while working alongside a young NSA Analyst who predicted two years ago that the security breach would occur.

Title: Devil's Triad
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a Marine Corporal is found shot dead and in doing so, discover a connection to the current boyfriend of Gibbs and Fornell's respective ex-wife while NSA Analyst Eleanor Bishop attempts to adjust to joining the NCIS team as a liaison between the NSA and NCIS.

Title: Homesick
Synopsis: As Washington D.C. gets ready for Christmas, the NCIS team find their holiday plans being put on hold as they investigate when a mysterious illness strikes young children from military families with the disease quickly spreading. As the team race to stop a devastating outbreak, Abby and Jimmy work with the Naval Medical Research Center to determine the strain of illness, all in hopes of delivering a cure before the holidays begin while Vance struggles with forgiveness as his estranged father-in-law makes a surprise visit to his home.

Title: Kill Chain
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the death of a Petty Officer, they realize that a drone that was recently stolen could be responsible and that the elusive terrorist Benham Parsa may be behind the attack. As the investigation progresses, Gibbs finds himself reuniting with someone from his past while potential tragedy lies in wait for one associate of the NCIS team.

Title: Double Back
Synopsis: In the aftermath of the attack on the Conrad Gala, the NCIS team find the investigation growing intense as they redouble their efforts to find Benham Parsa, a wanted terrorist and the leader of the Brotherhood of Doubt while McGee struggles to come to terms with what's happened to his girlfriend.

Title: Monsters and Men
Synopsis: As the NCIS team continue searching for Benham Parsa, the leader of the infamous terrorist group, the Brotherhood of Doubt, they also find themselves investigating the death of Parsa's supposed bodyguard, only for the team to later discover that the body in question is not who it appears to be. Things then turn a turn when Bishop reveals that she has been hunting Parsa ever since her days as an analyst with the NSA which ultimately threatens to jeopardize the entire case but when Parsa launches his final game plan while being held on the USS Wilmington, triggering a crisis, the NCIS team must act quickly or risk losing one of their own forever.

Title: Bulletproof
Synopsis: While investigating an abandoned bakery truck that has crashed on a road in downtown D.C., the NCIS team discover stolen merchandise apparently belonging to the United States Marine Corps inside the truck with the crates later revealed to contain body armor. Things later take a turn when Abby's tests reveal the supposedly safe body armor is actually flawed, capable of permanently paralyzing the wearer if they're hit with any gunfire or shrapnel. With the new information, the team's investigation grows more intense as they attempt to find and arrest the mastermind responsible while also ensuring that all the faulty body armor is ultimately all accounted for while Bishop attempts to adjust with being the newest member of the NCIS team and also a Probie.

Title: Dressed to Kill
Synopsis: A confrontation in an alleyway between DiNozzo and a man impersonating an officer in the United States Navy leaves the impostor dead. As DiNozzo is grounded to his desk following an IG investigation which will ultimately determine whether or not he acted accordingly in terms of shooting the man dead in self-defense, the rest of the NCIS team tackle the case and soon discover that it may be connected to a high-profile female Senator while Anthony DiNozzo Senior who has returned to Washington D.C. and who witnessed the confrontation and subsequent shooting has a secret to reveal to his son.

Title: Rock and a Hard Place
Synopsis: After a bomb detonates in the dressing room at a military charity concert, killing two personnel including a Navy Petty Officer, the NCIS team investigate and need to determine if the target was a washed-up rocker who was successful in the 1980s or if the bomb was part of a much larger scheme while Jimmy Palmer prepares for fatherhood.

Title: Crescent City Part 1
Synopsis: When the body of a Congressman and former NIS/NCIS agent washes ashore in New Orleans, NCIS Special Agent Dwayne Cassius Pride who is also the leader of the NCIS: New Orleans team arrives in D.C. to ask Gibbs and the NCIS team for help in the case but things change when the two teams working together discover that the FBI are involved, prompting Pride and Gibbs to meet with FBI agent Tobias Fornell but the investigation heightens when it's revealed that the current case may in fact be connected to the arrest of the Privileged Killer, a serial murderer who targeted military and public servants and who Pride and Gibbs helped arrest nearly twenty years ago.

Title: Crescent City Part 2
Synopsis: As the hunt for the copycat killer of the infamous Privileged Killer continues, Gibbs and Bishop search the city of New Orleans for answers with the help of Special Agent Dwayne Pride and Pride's own team while back in Washington D.C., as Tony receives a present from Bishop, he, McGee and FBI Special Agent Tobias Fornell also continue to track political connections to the case.

Title: Page Not Found
Synopsis: After returning to her job at the Department of Defense, McGee's girlfriend Delilah finds a break in a controversial case, prompting her to turn to the NCIS team for help while McGee talks to DiNozzo about whether he should ask Delilah to move in.

Title: Alleged
Synopsis: After a Navy officer is found dead on a rural road, the NCIS team must ascertain if the murder was the result of a bar fight or because he knew too much about an attack on a fellow female officer while DiNozzo and McGee start a juice cleanse to purge their bodies of impurities.

Title: Shooter
Synopsis: When a Marine photographer disappears prior to giving a testimony in an Army court-martial hearing, the NCIS team investigates both the murder he witnessed as well as his current piece on homeless military veterans who are sleeping rough in the D.C. area but things take an intense turn when the photographer is later found dead, having apparently died of a drug overdose. The investigation changes when Ducky later discovers that the victim was unconscious before he was given a lethal injection of drugs, confirming that the victim was murdered and evidence soon emerges, suggesting a human trafficking ring that's secretly operating in the D.C. area is active with the homeless veterans themselves also being used as possible guinea pigs while Abby tries to help a young female teenager who's living on the streets of D.C. reconnect with her family.

Title: The Admiral's Daughter
Synopsis: As the rest of the NCIS team investigate the death of a man whose remains were found in a septic tank, DiNozzo is sent to Marseille, France, having been given the top-secret assignment of bringing home an Admiral's daughter, only to stumble into a possible nightmare when he enters the NCIS office and finds that the NCIS office in Marseille has become a crime scene that has the bodies of seven NCIS personnel. As such, DiNozzo must turn to his team for help after being framed by one of the true killers who will ultimately stop at nothing in silencing both him and Amanda once and for all.

Title: Honor Thy Father
Synopsis: After successfully apprehending a criminal, the NCIS team are then assigned to investigate as to whether a U.S. Navy ship that served as a secret detention site for indicted terrorists was accidental or an intentional diversion for an escape and in doing so, are reunited with an enemy from their past while Gibbs travels to his childhood home of Stillwater after learning that his father has died.

Title: Twenty Klicks
Synopsis: Gibbs and McGee head to Moscow, Russian to bring Kevin Hussein who also has access to highly classified information back to the United States, only for the journey to take a disastrous turn when the helicopter they're on is shot down, leaving the three as the only survivors. Now left stranded on the border between Finland and Russia with the area itself also highly dangerous, the trio face a battle for survival as they attempt to avoid a group of mercenaries who are after them, their target being Kevin. Back in the States, the rest of the NCIS team use every contact at their disposal as they race against the clock to find their missing colleagues before it's too late.

Title: Kill the Messenger
Synopsis: When a Navy Lieutenant is killed on his way to a private meeting with the President, the NCIS team must determine if the murder was part of a recent stream of muggings in the area or a targeted hit to keep intelligence secret while Vance attempts to come to terms with an potentially devastating health crisis of his own.

Title: So It Goes
Synopsis: When a man is killed, the NCIS team soon uncover a potential connection to Ducky's estranged childhood best friend. Ducky and Bishop travel to the UK to interview the victim's family and co-workers as Ducky finds himself reflecting on the choices he made in the past and how they've affected his life while back in D.C., Gibbs, Tony and McGee continue investigating the murder.

Title: Choke Hold
Synopsis: While patrolling a park at night, two police officers come across a Naval research scientist sitting on a bench, the scientist having been garroted which eventually kills her. As such, the NCIS team are called in to investigate the circumstances surrounding the death although things quickly get complicated when SECNAV Sarah Porter later assigns the NCIS team to a joint terrorism task force with FBI agent Leia Pendergast as the leader of the task force. There's just one problem, though: the suspect that NCIS are searching for is also wanted by the Russian government led by someone well known to the team.

Title: The San Dominick
Synopsis: During a joint Coast Guard and NCIS training exercise which is being conducted at sea, Gibbs and CGIS Agent Borin spot a dead man overboard who is later discovered to be a missing crew member from a ship sixty nautical miles away. Seeking answers, NCIS and CGIS launch a joint investigation with Gibbs later arriving on the ship, the San Dominick and discovering that the ship itself has apparently been taken over by a group of pirates but all is not what it seems.

Title: Parental Guidance Suggested
Synopsis: The NCIS team must determine if the murder of a Navy commander's wife is linked to her profession as a therapist or an act of terrorism after finding the commander's name on a Jihadist target list, only to get a shock when they discover who the true killer really is while the team discusses Halloween costumes and Tony's recent dating habits.

Title: The Searchers
Synopsis: After investigating the murder of a retired Master Sergeant, the NCIS team uncovers a fraudulent charity that preys on those searching for missing military personnel but when the main suspect flees to Vietnam, Gibbs and DiNozzo head to Vietnam in pursuit. As this happens, Bishop agonizes over the results of her probation evaluation while Tony contemplates adopting a stray cat that followed him home.

Title: Semper Fortis
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the cause of a hit and run accident that has left the driver, a Navy Petty Officer dead and two civilians who were passengers badly injured. As the team search for a possible motive, Gibbs attempts to find a way to ensure that a Navy Hospital Corpsman who treated the victims at the scene does not suffer any punishment despite the fact that the Corpsman illegally provided medical aid to the victims seconds after the crash while the team also discuss Abby's relationship with Park Police Sergeant Burt Moore which has hit the two month mark.
Writers: Matthew R. Jarrett & Scott J. Jarrett

Title: Grounded
Synopsis: While weather worsens outdoors, DiNozzo, Bishop, and her husband, Jake are stuck at Dulles Airport working on a case involving a possible terrorist threat, only to discover twists and turns as the case turns out to be anything but ordinary with the NCIS team later finding themselves battling to stop a possible assassination attempt.

Title: House Rules
Synopsis: The NCIS team consult with three cyber-terrorists they all had dealings with the past after a citywide Internet shutdown the week before Christmas while McGee reflects on the case and Gibbs's infamous rules as he writes a heartfelt letter to his father.

Title: Check
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate two crime scenes, both of which appear to be copycats of two previous cases while two of Gibbs's ex-wives show up at a crime scene to discuss something important with him. Tragedy later strikes when someone with a close connection to Gibbs is murdered by an old enemy.

Title: The Enemy Within
Synopsis: The NCIS team searches for a home-grown terrorist after a rescue mission in Syria reveals that an American was involved in the capture of a social worker, only to discover that things aren't what they appear to be with the team later racing to stop an attempted assassination while McGee and Bishop become suspicious of DiNozzo's unusual behavior.

Title: We Build, We Fight
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a Navy Lieutenant who was set to be the first openly gay service member of the United States military to receive the Medal of Honor is murdered with the resulting investigation reuniting them with DOD agent Hollis Mann while Palmer prepares to become a father for the first time.

Title: Cadence
Synopsis: A Marine who was also a member of the Remington Military Academy, prompting the NCIS team to investigate. As this happens, DiNozzo finds himself remembering his day as a young teenage student at the Academy while Bishop and her husband, Jake, invite Gibbs and the team for a special dinner.

Title: Cabin Fever
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate an explosion that occurred at an upcoming terrorist summit that was scheduled to take place on a Navy ship and which also resulted in the death of a Navy Petty Officer, Gibbs chooses to sit out the resulting investigation, choosing instead to help grief-stricken FBI agent Tobias Fornell whose life is on the verge of imploding altogether as Fornell still struggles to come to terms with his ex-wife's brutal murder while an old enemy returns for a final showdown with both Gibbs and Fornell.

Title: Blast from the Past
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a covert identity created for one of Gibbs's undercover cases twenty years ago resurfaces after a murder victim is found to be living under the alias with the investigation eventually leading them to a group of Serbians operating illegally in the United States.

Title: The Artful Dodger
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the murder of a Navy Lieutenant while also attempting to discover the truth behind the theft of a painting which is later revealed to be a fake while DiNozzo Senior returns, ultimately assisting the team with the case.

Title: Status Update
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when the body of a woman who is later revealed to be a criminal is discovered in the garage of a home of a Gunnery Sergeant with the United States Marine Corps with the NCIS team soon discovering that a possible connection to a terrorist group that the Department of Defense have been tracking, bringing the team back into contact with Delilah Fielding, McGee's girlfriend.

Title: Patience
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the murder of a Petty Officer and McGee soon discovers that the death is connected to a bombing that occurred at an airport forty years ago, one that Gibbs, DiNozzo and Vance have been secretly working on for the last two years.

Title: No Good Deed
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the murder of a Marine and soon discover that the murder weapon used in the killing was originally purchased for the controversial ATF sting operation "Operation Fast and Furious", prompting DiNozzo to be partnered with his girlfriend, ATF agent Zoe Keates, while DiNozzo Senior arrives in D.C. for a special dinner with both Tony and Zoe.

Title: Lost in Translation
Synopsis: Following the murder of a Marine, the NCIS team investigate and soon discover that the killing in question is linked to a terrorist group in Afghanistan who are holding another Marine hostage overseas, prompting Gibbs and Bishop to head to Afghanistan to save the captured Marine before it's too late while Tony is stunned when he learns that McGee is the new face of NCIS's recruitment brochures.

Title: Troll
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Navy Ensign who worked in the Office of Naval Intelligence and soon discover that something much bigger is on the horizon, leading them to reunite with Ned Dorneget who is now working for the NCIS Cyber Operations Division with Dorneget returning to help with the case while the team discover that Jake and Gibbs have become good friends.

Title: The Lost Boys
Synopsis: In the aftermath of the previous episode, the NCIS team continue to find associates of the international terrorist group, the Calling with the team discovering that the Calling are not only recruiting young children and teenagers through the Internet but that the group itself is also purchasing S-bombs off the black market. As such, the case turns into a global effort, bringing NCIS into contact with various federal agencies all over the world while NCIS itself later suffers a huge tragedy when one of their own is killed in a blast while Gibbs, having been left haunted by his failure to help Bradley Simek attempts to help Luke Harris, a young, vulnerable teenager from falling victim to the Calling.

Title: Neverland
Synopsis: Following the death of an NCIS agent close to them, the main NCIS team continue investigating the Calling, the terrorist group who have been secretly and knowingly recruiting young children and teenagers via the Internet and as the search for the group's leader as well as members associated with the group itself grows, stretching across the world, NCIS soon finds itself facing more potential tragedy when one of their own is attacked by an unexpected figure.

Title: Stop the Bleeding
Synopsis: In the aftermath of being shot in the previous episode, Gibbs finds himself fighting for his life and drifting between life and death as he's treated on board the medical ward of the Navy ship the U.S.S. Daniel Webster. DiNozzo and CIA officer Joanna Teague, who is the mother of deceased NCIS Special Agent Ned Dorneget, travel to Shanghai, China to take down the structure of the Calling once and for all, while everyone tries to come to terms with Gibbs being shot.

Title: Personal Day
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the murder of a Marine Sergeant, which is later revealed to be connected to a cold case concerning a notorious drug dealer. Tony soon discovers that Gibbs and DEA agent Luis Mitchell share a tragic past while Gibbs's new appearance has the team intrigued.

Title: Incognito
Synopsis: A Marine calls Gibbs to discuss a possible case but the Marine is found murdered in Quantico hours later, prompting the NCIS team to investigate. McGee and Bishop go undercover as a married couple to run surveillance on a Marine Lieutenant and his wife, only for the NCIS team to discover that the couple are not who they appear to be.

Title: Double Trouble
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the murder of a Navy Seaman Apprentice and discover that it's connected to a disgraced former NCIS Special Agent who was jailed for stealing. With new aspects of the case having emerged, Vance, who was responsible for arresting the disgraced agent, returns to the field and partners with Gibbs to solve the case once and for all.

Title: Lockdown
Synopsis: To help her NCIS colleagues with a murder case concerning a Navy Captain, Abby visits a pharmaceutical lab but soon finds herself trapped and without any communications to the outside world after mysterious armed men invade the building, triggering a hostage situation. It now falls to Abby to find a way to end the crisis before it's too late but all is not what it seems.

Title: Viral
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when the murder of a Navy Petty officer is revealed to match the M.O. that a local serial killer called the Tri-State Sniper is using and it falls to the team to discover if this is the serial killer's latest victim or if it's a copycat killing. McGee and Delilah must learn to compromise before moving in together and potential tragedy lies in store for Bishop.

Title: 16 Years
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the murder of a retired Navy Lieutenant which occurred in a forest, they soon learn that Ducky is a member of a secret society dedicated to solving cold cases while Abby is left extremely guilt-ridden after learning that she may have been responsible for putting an innocent man in jail for sixteen years when the team discover that she was the one who conducted the test that led to the man's imprisonment in the first place.

Title: Saviors
Synopsis: When insurgents in Sudan attack a group of volunteer doctors, abducting two and leaving five dead, DiNozzo and McGee travel to Sudan to investigate the crime scene and tackle the joint murder and kidnapping case, while Gibbs, Bishop, Ducky, Abby and Palmer work the case from Washington D.C. DiNozzo is reunited with his ex-girlfriend Jeanne Benoit as they attempt to rescue the missing doctors, while attempting to get to the bottom of what happened.

Title: Day in Court
Synopsis: After a Petty Officer's case is dismissed due to a mishandled warrant, the Petty Officer volunteers to be court-martialed on the condition that NCIS agree to conduct their own investigation into the dismissed case. Bishop and Jake discuss their martial problems, with Jake revealing a secret that ultimately threatens to destroy their marriage forever.

Title: Blood Brothers
Synopsis: When his two Marine siblings are killed in the line of duty, the team is tasked to help a sailor battling leukemia locate a potential bone marrow transplant before it's too late. In the aftermath of events in the previous episode, Bishop returns home to Oklahoma to spend Thanksgiving with her family.

Title: Spinning Wheel
Synopsis: When Ducky is attacked by a man claiming to have information on his half-brother who supposedly died decades ago, the NCIS team investigate as they seek to find the man responsible for Ducky's abduction and solve the murder of a Marine Private. Ducky remembers the final emotional days he had with his half-brother while, with Christmas approaching, Bishop and Jake reunite to discuss the future of their relationship.

Title: Sister City (Part 1)
Synopsis: When the passengers and fight crew of a private plane belonging to a military tech company including a Navy Commander are discovered dead after their plane lands, the entire crew having been fatally poisoned, the NCIS team investigate what happened and during the investigation, they also form a partnership with their New Orleans counterparts as the two teams attempt to find Abby's missing brother and determine a motive for the poisoning.

Title: Déjà Vu
Synopsis: When the body of a Navy Seaman is found at a rubbish dump, the NCIS team investigate and discover that the victim was due to testify before a grand jury concerning the possible resurgence of an international human-trafficking ring, one that Bishop investigated during her time at the NSA while the NCIS team try to adapt as a storm causes a massive power outage all through Washington D.C.
Writers: Matthew R. Jarrett & Scott J. Jarrett

Title: Decompressed
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a deep-sea diver and find themselves conducting a very unorthodox and unusual investigation in which they examine the case on the outside while the remains and the victim's coworkers who are also suspects must stay in a high-tech decompression chamber for four days.

Title: React
Synopsis: When SECNAV Sarah Porter's teenage daughter is kidnapped, the NCIS team partner with FBI Agent Tobias Fornell in order to solve the case, determine a motive for the kidnapping and bring Porter's daughter home while McGee's childhood friend, NCIS Special Agent Valerie Page is in town to assist the team with advance tactics training.

Title: Loose Cannons
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate a raid on a Naval Base, Dr. Cyril Taft finds himself experiencing the rush and thrills of being an assistant in the case after he's assigned surgical duty to a suspect that the team have in custody, with Taft later discovering key evidence crucial to the case. DiNozzo pays a visit to his ex-girlfriend Jeanne Benoit as he chases a potential lead involving a group of doctors in Sudan.

Title: After Hours
Synopsis: The NCIS team find their plans being interrupted when they discover errors in a seemingly cut-and-dried case that has apparently been closed. As the team work to find out what's gone wrong in the case, McGee and Delilah argue over the importance of not discussing work during dinner, while DiNozzo bores his date with shop talk.

Title: Scope
Synopsis: When an American couple are shot dead while exploring an area in Iraq, the NCIS team re-examine an ambush on a group of Special Ops that occurred in the same area six months prior to the attack. During the main investigation, Gibbs discovers that he needs the account of the solo survivor of the attack who is being treated for PTSD at the Walter Reed Memorial Centre. Gibbs attempts to connect with the Marine, with the team soon discovering a potential suspect responsible for the killings, forcing Gibbs to go back to his roots as a sniper when new evidence suggests that the killer is about to strike again.

Title: Reasonable Doubts
Synopsis: When a Navy Public Affairs officer is murdered, the NCIS team must find out who is lying: the victim's wife or mistress, with things becoming increasingly complicated when the two women accuse each other of committing the crime. Anthony DiNozzo Senior returns to D.C. to help a homeless woman who believes that he is her father.

Title: Charade
Synopsis: While investigating the death of a man, the NCIS team soon face a battle on their hands when DiNozzo's identity is stolen by multiple criminals who, while posing as the fakes, begin blackmailing various Senators.

Title: Return to Sender
Synopsis: Two British prisoners, one of whom is a former spy, escape after arriving in the United States via a shipping container, which also resulted in them taking a female prison guard hostage and who was ultimately killed. The NCIS team are reunited with FBI agent Tobias Fornell as they both investigate the case. McGee goes apartment-hunting with DiNozzo, with McGee determined to find out how DiNozzo purchased his own lavish place, and tragedy later strikes the NCIS team yet again when a good friend is murdered.

Title: Homefront
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a fourteen-year-old teenager manages to foil a home invasion, with Gibbs suspecting that the teenager is hiding something about what happened while Director Vance and Senior FBI Agent Tobias Fornell travel to London as part of the ongoing escaped British spy case.

Title: Dead Letter
Synopsis: In the aftermath of the attack that has left one of the NCIS team's allies badly wounded, the NCIS team redouble their efforts to track down disgraced British spy Jacob Scott, who's seeking revenge against NCIS. Assistance comes from both the FBI and MI6 in the form of two new agents, but everything is not what it appears to be.

Title: Family First
Synopsis: In the aftermath of the attack on the David farmhouse that has resulted in the assumed death of former NCIS Special Agent Ziva David, greatly devastating the NCIS team, they continue working alongside their counterparts in the FBI and MI6 as they conduct an international manhunt for disgraced agent Trent Kort while Tony finds his life being turned upside down by an unexpected revelation.

Title: Rogue
Synopsis: When a car explosion leaves a Navy Commander dead, his Marine wife unconscious and their teenage daughter unharmed, the NCIS team investigate and soon discover a connection to an NCIS Special Agent who went missing six months ago while on a deep undercover assignment in Argentina and as the case goes on, NCIS Special Agent Alexandra Quinn, an instructor at FLETC arrives at NCIS HQ and begins shadowing the team in order to find out why Gibbs rejected the eight agents she recommended to him.

Title: Being Bad
Synopsis: While investigating a death that took place at a high school reunion being held at Quantico, the NCIS team uncover a bomb plot that soon leads them to a long-running theft ring while Torres and Quinn adjust to life as members of Gibbs's team which also includes new sitting arrangements and the bullpen's structure also changing in the process.

Title: Privileged Information
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the death of a Marine Sergeant who fell from a building, Doctor Grace Confalone confides in Gibbs that he should treat it as a murder investigation while Torres searches for a place to live.

Title: Love Boat
Synopsis: When the body of a Navy Lieutenant is discovered on board a destroyer, the U.S.S. Hover during a tiger cruise where civilians guests are given the option of spending the night on the ship, Gibbs, Quinn and Palmer head to sea to investigate the circumstances behind the death while McGee thinks about the perfect proposal for Delilah.

Title: Philly
Synopsis: When a missing MI6 Officer is linked to a murdered Navy Petty Officer, Gibbs sends Quinn and Bishop to Philadelphia to work with MI6 Officer Clayton Reeves with the case prompting Quinn to recall painful memories concerning an NCIS case that made her leave the field and become an instructor at FLETC.

Title: Shell Game
Synopsis: After a Petty Officer escapes captivity, the NCIS team investigate and discover a possible connection to her missing husband while Abby knits both Quinn and Torres personalized gifts.

Title: Home of the Brave
Airdate: November 15, 2016- (deferred from November 1, 2016 due to the MLB: World Series).
Synopsis: Torres boldly breaks NCIS protocol when he discovers that a witness in a case that the NCIS team are investigating is wanted by the agency, U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (I.C.E.) while Abby, Bishop and McGee all attempt to woo landlord Tony DiNozzo Sr. in the hope of subletting Tony's apartment.

Title: Enemy Combatant
Synopsis: After being sent to Gitmo to gather evidence for a murder case concerning a United States Navy chaplain, Bishop begins questioning her previous work with the NSA while also attempting to come to terms with her three brothers who are visiting for the Thanksgiving holiday and soon begin pestering her coworkers at NCIS in an attempt to find out who she's dating.

Title: Pay to Play
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate a series of escalating threats against Congresswoman Jenna Flemming while Vance oversees temporary protection detail for Congresswoman Flemming.

Title: The Tie That Binds
Synopsis: After the NCIS team discover evidence from the murder of a Navy Captain which is connected to Ducky's dead mother, Ducky finds himself questioning a pivotal life choice he made thirty-seven years ago while the team exchange presents as Gibbs spends Christmas dinner with Fornell.

Title: Willoughby
Synopsis: NCIS searches for new leads after an undercover operation to apprehend a businessman who uses acts of terror to manipulate the stock market to his own advantage is compromised with Bishop and Qasim working together to find a potential lead that could solve the case with an unexpected tragedy soon hitting the couple, one that may change Bishop's life forever.

Title: Off the Grid
Synopsis: After spotting the brother of an NCIS Most Wanted suspect, Gibbs immediately assumes a former alias and goes undercover with their infamous antigovernmental militia group while Bishop and Reeves work together on an off-the-books investigation.

Title: Keep Going
Synopsis: During an NCIS investigation into a hit and run, Palmer joins a stranger on the outside ledge of a building in an attempt to save the man's life.

Title: Nonstop
Synopsis: The murder of a Petty Officer in a small town outside D.C. prompts NCIS to once again work with "The Sherlocks" - a privately funded investigative team that includes their newest member: Anthony DiNozzo Senior.

Title: Pandora's Box (Part 1)
Synopsis: Abby's homeland security think-tank is compromised and she is later found in be possession of a real bomb while participating in an undercover operation for Homeland Security at a rock concert. The NCIS team investigate and discover that not only has the leader of the group been murdered but a theoretical terror playbook has been stolen.

Title: A Many Splendored Thing
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate the death of a Navy Lieutenant Commander, while Torres teaches his colleagues the art of pickpocketing. Bishop embarks on a personal quest, determined to exact revenge against Kai Chen who ordered the murder of her boyfriend, Qasim Naasir when the team discovers a new lead in the case.
Writers: Steven D. Binder & David J. North

Title: What Lies Above
Synopsis: McGee discovers his apartment has been torn apart by robbers trying to locate an item of great value hidden somewhere by the convicted criminal who previously owned the unit while Congresswoman Flemming tries to persuade Director Vance to pursue a career in politics.

Title: M.I.A.
Synopsis: To carry out a sailor's dying wish, Gibbs and the NCIS team reinvestigate a murder case that was originally ruled an accidental death with the case also reminding Torres of a tragic time from his past.

Title: The Wall
Synopsis: When a Marine is murdered at an event being held the Honor Flight Network, a non-profit organization that arranges veterans to visit the World War II, Korea and Vietnam War Memorials for free, the NCIS team investigate while relying on an irritable Vietnam War veteran, Henry Rogers, to provide details on the victim's whereabouts throughout the day while McGee and Bishop investigate a juicy rumor about Quinn and Torres.

Title: A Bowl of Cherries
Synopsis: When a vice admiral's laptop is infected with ransomware, he enlists McGee and the NCIS team to track down the hacker before the computer virus eliminates his personal and professional files forever while Quinn takes time off to assist her mother, Marie after she receives a "911" text.

Title: One Book, Two Covers
Synopsis: Torres must rely on old case notes and contacts after a Marine's murder is linked to a former dirt bike gang he joined for a year-long undercover operation.

Title: Beastmaster
Synopsis: When a Marine Sergeant is found murdered in a National Park, the NCIS team partner with a Mounted Police Sergeant to solve a string of related crimes that have occurred there.

Title: Something Blue
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when a young and healthy Petty Officer aboard a Navy destroyer dies in his sleep while the stress of McGee and Delilah's imminent wedding takes its toll as Delilah is rushed to the hospital after collapsing.

Title: Rendezvous
Synopsis: Gibbs, McGee and Torres travel to a remote area in Paraguay controlled by a group of violent rebels in an attempt to locate a missing Navy SEAL who disappeared during an unsanctioned trip but the three agents soon find themselves fighting for their lives in a dangerous mission.
Writers: George Schenck & Frank Cardea & Steven D. Binder

Title: House Divided
Synopsis: With two months having passed since Gibbs and McGee were last seen fighting an elusive group of rebels in a Paraguay jungle, the NCIS team in D.C. tirelessly searches for their missing colleagues while Vance and Torres are summoned to a congressional hearing regarding the fallout from the mission.

Title: Twofer
Synopsis: NCIS is called in to investigate when the body of a missing Navy Lieutenant who disappeared a year and a half ago is located by a cemetery grounds crew while they are relocating caskets on the property. As the team attempt to solve their latest case, Gibbs and McGee must pass a psych evaluation with Doctor Grace Confalone before officially resuming all work responsibilities.

Title: Exit Strategy
Synopsis: While on a stakeout with Metro P.D., Torres's partner mysteriously vanishes and is later found dead, NCIS investigate the death, uncovering evidence from a ten year old murder with the team later racing to save a young boy who's been kidnapped while Ducky's friend, Cadence Darwin presents him with a new opportunity during his guest lecture series.

Title: Skeleton Crew
Synopsis: During a storm that has shut down Washington D.C. and also knocked out power, the NCIS team investigate the kidnapping of a sailor with Torres and Bishop being sent out to sea to track evidence which is connected to the case while Vance welcomes NCIS Special Agent Jacqueline Sloane, a forensic psychologist he lobbied to transfer from California to headquarters and onboard the ship, Bishop meets a face from her high school days.

Title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
Synopsis: After Reeves witnesses the kidnapping of his friend, the NCIS team investigate and soon discover that the primary suspect who disappeared two days ago is linked to the theft of confidential military information while an embarrassing photo from McGee's teenage years becomes a popular meme.

Title: Trapped
Synopsis: After a Navy Petty Officer is found murdered on a golf course, McGee spends hours on the victim's ham radio trying to locate a key witness while Palmer asks his co-workers to donate to a charity that builds playgrounds for kids of all abilities with Torres ultimately surprising everyone with his generosity.

Title: Burden of Proof
Synopsis: After a convicted felon swears the NCIS agency framed him for murder a decade ago, Gibbs begins his own investigation, starting with a new autopsy by Ducky while Fornell joins the team since he was the lead investigator in the original joint FBI and NCIS case.

Title: Voices
Synopsis: An NCIS person of interest in a bribery and fraud case is found murdered after a runner is led to his body by a strange voice while McGee and Delilah disagree on whether to find out the baby's sex or keep it a surprise.

Title: Ready or Not
Synopsis: The team find their respective Thanksgiving plans being put on hold while they track an elusive international arms dealer in D.C. who recently murdered an MI5 officer who was Sloane's close friend while Abby races Delilah to the hospital when her labor starts three weeks early.

Title: Double Down
Synopsis: As Torres and Sloane run protection detail for U.S. Senator John Phillips in Afghanistan for the holidays, they must urgently return to the States after hearing the senator's son, Chandler, is in the ICU while Gibbs and the rest of the team investigate the altercation.

Title: High Tide
Synopsis: During an NCIS sting operation that's tracking illegal drug-running out of the Norfolk civilian marine, Torres and Bishop go undercover as a criminal couple available for hire.
Writers: David J. North & Steven D. Binder

Title: Dark Secrets
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when a Navy Lieutenant who was due to celebrate her birthday and also appeared to have a seemingly happy and successful life commits suicide.

Title: Family Ties
Synopsis: After McGee and Torres visit a high school student who witnessed a hit and run that resulted in the death of a Marine, the investigation hits a snag when the student and her parents flee, leaving the NCIS team struggling to solve the case while Vance's daughter is arrested for shoplifting.

Title: Keep Your Friends Close
Synopsis: After the body of a missing Navy commander is found, Vance orders Gibbs and the NCIS team to work with former FBI Agent Tobias "T.C." Fornell, the private investigator who was hired to locate him while Bishop and Torres interview convicted investment advisor Albert Hathaway when the victim is linked to his highly publicized trial.

Title: Keep Your Enemies Closer
Synopsis: NCIS strikes a deal with convicted murderer Paul Triff, giving him a 48-hour furlough at his former residence - which is now McGee's home - in exchange for information that can convict his former cellmate, Gabriel Hicks, the murderer who deceived Gibbs and Fornell.

Title: Handle With Care
Synopsis: Gibbs and the team work to clear the name of retired Marine Sergeant John Ross when cyanide is found in one of the hundreds of care packages he sends to active-duty Marines.
Writers: Scott J. Jarrett & Matthew R. Jarrett

Title: One Man's Trash
Synopsis: Gibbs and Ducky investigate when they see an antique war stick on television, one that could be the missing murder weapon to a case that has been cold for sixteen years.

Title: Death From Above
Synopsis: The NCIS headquarters are evacuated after the team discovers a body as well as bomb materials on the roof of the squad room, sending the NCIS team on a race to stop an impending attack while the team also begin reading the first draft of Ducky's upcoming book.

Title: The Numerical Limit
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the deaths of two men, they meet a 10 year old girl who's being targeted by members of a violent gang that Gibbs has crossed paths with before.
Writers: David J. North & Steven D. Binder

Title: Sight Unseen
Synopsis: NCIS searches for a Petty Officer suspected of assault who escapes when the sheriff transporting him crashes into a lake while Torres works closely with a key witness who may help the team solve the case.

Title: One Step Forward
Synopsis: At the request of a woman, the NCIS team investigate her mother's murder as the woman believes the local authorities convicted the wrong man while Abby is awarded a dinner reservation for two to a brand-new five-star restaurant in an igloo and has to decide which co-worker deserves to go with her.

Title: Two Steps Back
Synopsis: As the NCIS team mourn the loss of a close friend while another is left comatose, they begin searching old case files to determine who from the past wants revenge against one of their own.

Title: Fallout
Synopsis: While Gibbs attends the memorial service for a friend who was lost at sea, he discovers that the deceased man, Navy Captain Phillip Brooks, has in fact been hiding in a fallout shelter after his boat was attacked and he swam to shore while the team struggle to come to terms with Abby's departure from NCIS and Reeves's death.
Writers: David J. North & Christopher J. Waild

Title: Date With Destiny
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate a bomb threat that's been made against a Navy ship, Sloane is adamant that a man who held her hostage and tortured her years ago in Afghanistan, and was believed to have been killed following her rescue, is alive and in D.C., leading Vance and Gibbs to fear she's willing to risk everything to destroy this man.
Writers: Scott Williams & George Schenck & Frank Cardea

Title: Destiny's Child
Synopsis: With one month having passed since Vance was kidnapped, the NCIS team continues their worldwide search for their missing Director.

Title: Love Thy Neighbor
Synopsis: After a Navy Lieutenant is found murdered in his hot tub, the team interviews several families in the victim's peculiar neighborhood with the team soon discovering that there's a serial killer operating in the neighborhood while Torres faces the consequences after a night out with Palmer ends with the two of them being arrested.

Title: Boom
Synopsis: When an explosion occurs outside the home of a Navy Petty Officer, leaving two people dead, the NCIS team investigate and soon find themselves racing against the clock to find and stop a bomber whose targets appear to be random. Vance continues physical therapy for the injuries he sustained during his time as a prisoner of Nigel Hakim, "The Monster".

Title: Third Wheel
Synopsis: Gibbs finds his quiet vacation at his remote cabin interrupted by a surprise visit from Tobias Fornell and Navy Captain Phillip Brooks as well as a call from NCIS asking for his help locating a robber hiding in the woods near him.

Title: Fragments
Synopsis: After a 50-year-old tape recording left by a murder victim is found, the NCIS team tries to exonerate Ray Jennings, the Marine serving a life sentence for the crime.

Title: Beneath The Surface
Synopsis: After NCIS arrives at a Halloween crime scene, Torres recognizes the victim as a friend from federal law enforcement training while Jimmy thinks his lab is haunted by ghosts after objects keep mysteriously moving.
Writers: Scott J. Jarrett & Matthew R. Jarrett

Title: A Thousand Words
Synopsis: After a mural by a street artist and activist is stolen, the NCIS investigation leads to a conspiracy regarding a Navy contractor and the safety of ocean mammals while Bishop shares a special connection with the street artist.

Title: Friendly Fire
Synopsis: McGee and Bishop travel to Afghanistan after a murder case in the states is linked to a string of soldiers killed by friendly fire overseas while Kasie leaves the lab and accompanies Torres into the field to process additional forensic evidence.

Title: Tailing Angie
Synopsis: When the lead suspect of an unsolved and high-profile robbery case is released from prison, the NCIS team resumes their investigation with an undercover stakeout.

Title: What Child is This?
Synopsis: The team's Christmas holiday plans are put on hold when the murder investigation of a Navy veteran includes the discovery of a new-born baby who has no identification and no apparent ties to a family.

Title: Toil and Trouble
Synopsis: A murder investigation is put in jeopardy when the United States Secretary of Defense Wynn Crawford visits NCIS Headquarters and promptly shuts down Gibbs's murder investigation while also demanding that McGee and Torres be arrested for their actions in the case.

Title: The Last Link
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the murder of a Navy Lieutenant who was in protective custody from an infamous drug dealer, Gibbs finds himself accompanying old family friend, Army Corporal John Sydney, on a road trip to search for a missing military I.D. bracelet.

Title: She
Synopsis: NCIS investigate when a confused and malnourished nine year old girl is found hiding in a storage unit on a Marine base, with the team discovering it's connected to a ten year old cold case regarding the disappearance of a Navy recruit. As Bishop digs deeper, she learns that her predecessor has been keeping notebooks and files on the case.

Title: Once Upon a Tim
Synopsis: While at a crime scene where a Department of Defense contractor has been found murdered, McGee is shocked when the unique password he used for a computer he owned during high school is uncovered with things becoming personal when an intruder breaks into his home to steal the computer in question.
Writers: David J. North & Steven D. Binder

Title: Crossing The Line
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigates a man overboard fatality from a Navy destroyer at sea with the investigation soon revealing that his death was due to consuming an energy drink that was laced with drugs while Torres is frustrated with Vance's assignment to mentor three high school students.

Title: Bears and Cubs
Synopsis: Jimmy finds himself being torn between family loyalty and work after his father-in-law, Ed, asks him to tamper with evidence from NCIS's current murder investigation while Ed's poker buddy, Anthony DiNozzo Senior offers to help with the case.

Title: Silent Service
Synopsis: While on the nuclear submarine U.S.S. Memphis, conducting an investigation into the death of a Navy SEAL, Gibbs and Bishop are left trapped when the submarine dives for a mission with Vance discovering from the Pentagon that the submarine has gone radio silent while McGee and Torres race against the clock to find and stop the person responsible for the actions that the sub has taken.
Writers: Scott J. Jarrett & Matthew R. Jarrett

Title: Mona Lisa
Synopsis: Torres relies on his team's investigative skills after he wakes up on a dilapidated fishing boat, covered in blood and unable to remember the last twelve hours.

Title: Perennial
Synopsis: Following an active shooter lockdown at a naval hospital, the NCIS team searches for a suspect who fled the scene with Sloane also investigating after she discovers that someone from her past was inside the hospital and as such is a key witness in the case.

Title: Hail & Farewell
Synopsis: NCIS investigates the death of a Marine Major who was thought to have died in the 9/11 attack on the Pentagon when human remains are discovered at a construction site with Gibbs vowing to solve the case due to his own personal history with the victim.

Title: Judge, Jury...
Synopsis: After entering cold case DNA into the system, Kasie solves a 30-year-old murder case but a loophole in the legal system may set the suspect free while McGee visits an elite technology company in Silicon Valley that is offering him a highly-paid position.

Title: ...and Executioner
Synopsis: After NCIS finds a secret government bank account that's funding a nationwide network of vigilante justice, the team must determine who is acting as judge and jury.
Writers: Christopher J. Waild & David J. North

Title: Lost Time
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigates the murder of a Marine Sergeant in the States who was hailed as a war hero for his efforts overseas while Gibbs turns to Doctor Grace Confalone for advice after he uncharacteristically unravels and abandons his team at a crime scene.

Title: Daughters
Synopsis: Former FBI Agent Tobias Fornell, who's now a Private Investigator, pleads with Gibbs to do whatever is necessary to take down drug dealers and suppliers in the area after his daughter, Emily Fornell, is hospitalized from an opiate overdose while Gibbs is haunted by the personal aspects of the case and also his own history with vigilante justice.

Title: Out of the Darkness
Synopsis: Ziva surprises Gibbs with a cryptic warning, prompting him to question why she remained underground for years while being presumed dead by her family and her former NCIS colleagues.

Title: Into the Light
Synopsis: With their lives in danger, Gibbs and Ziva's rogue investigation takes an unexpected turn when a possible terrorist plot is revealed.

Title: Going Mobile
Synopsis: After the body of a Marine Lieutenant is found hidden under an 18-wheeler that was delivering goods to the Navy Yard, the NCIS team investigate and track the vehicle's previous locations to pinpoint the crime scene and suspect while Sloane encourages the team to sit down and talk about Ziva's recent reappearance.

Title: Someone Else's Shoes
Synopsis: The NCIS team links a bizarre crime scene at Arlington National Cemetery to a string of attacks on homeless veterans while Vance orders McGee, Bishop and Torres to complete hours of evidence garage clean-up duty as punishment for withholding information.

Title: Wide Awake
Synopsis: NCIS investigates a Marine Corporal after evidence suggests she murdered her neighbor while being treated for insomnia by a hypnotherapist as Gibbs befriends his new neighbors after the 9-year-old's baseball crashes through his window.

Title: Institutionalized
Synopsis: When a Petty Officer's nephew is found murdered at his "welcome home from prison" party, the evidence suggests Kasie's lifelong best friend, Dante Brown is the suspect although Kasie believes otherwise.

Title: No Vacancy
Synopsis: While investigating a Marine's murder, the NCIS team uncovers a labyrinth of live-streaming spy cameras hidden in the rooms of a Virginia motel.

Title: Musical Chairs
Synopsis: The team investigates the murder of a musician in the Navy's most elite band that performs at diplomatic events around the world.

Title: IRL
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a popular gaming app live-streams the murder of a Navy Petty Officer while Gibbs watches his 11-year-old neighbor, Phineas, when his mom must leave on a last-minute trip.

Title: The North Pole
Synopsis: Gibbs and the team assist Ziva with "the one thing" she said she would need to take care of before returning to her family.

Title: In The Wind
Synopsis: When Phineas disappears, Gibbs gets personally involved with the team becoming increasingly concerned for his well-being.

Title: Flight Plan
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigates an F-18 crash and the subsequent disappearance of the pilot who operated the aircraft while McGee reluctantly discusses a very personal decision with his teammates.

Title: Sound Off
Synopsis: After a body is found at an unmanned aerial vehicle testing site, the NCIS team must determine if the death was murder or an accident while Palmer carefully interviews medical assistant candidates.

Title: On Fire
Synopsis: After Torres and Bishop are victims of a hit-and-run while out jogging, Torres fights for his life in the ICU as the rest of the NCIS team investigate in an attempt to find out who was responsible.
Writers: David J. North & Steven D. Binder

Title: Lonely Hearts
Synopsis: The lead suspect in an NCIS murder investigation is a woman Gibbs's friend Phillip Brooks met on a dating site while Sloane has a secret admirer on Valentine's Day.

Title: Ephemera
Synopsis: While investigating the suicide of a retired Navy officer who left a rare, valuable - and possibly stolen - coin to the Nation Museum of the Navy, the team imagine themselves in his life story in order to piece together how the coin ended up in his possession.

Title: In a Nutshell
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigates the death of a Navy officer murdered the same way as his parents a decade ago, they stumble across a storage container filled with dollhouses that display recreations of murder scenes. While they all agree to clean out their living spaces, some have a harder time saying goodbye to their possessions than others.

Title: Schooled
Synopsis: The team searches for answers when the body of a well-regarded Navy technician in the Reserves is found floating in a lake where a popular community event is being held while Sloane is caught off-guard when her daughter, Faith, makes an unexpected request.
Writers: Kate Torgovnick May & Steven D. Binder

Title: Blarney
Synopsis: When Kasie and Jimmy are held hostage in the diner after a jewelry store robbery goes awry, they attempt to keep the other customers safe from the thieves while Gibbs, Bishop and Torres attempt to bring the siege to an end without any bloodshed.

Title: The Arizona
Synopsis: The team work to verify the identity of a man who claims to have served on the U.S.S. Arizona.

Title: Sturgeon Season
Synopsis: As Gibbs and Fornell attempt to track down the leader of a drug ring who supplied drugs to Fornell's daughter, the rest of the NCIS team deals with the case of a missing cadaver from the NCIS autopsy room.

Title: Everything Starts Somewhere
