Synopsis: Flashbacks reveal the murder case that first introduced young Gibbs to NCIS and his introduction to young, new-to-America Ducky.

Title: Blood and Treasure
Synopsis: The discovery of two dead bodies in a forest leads the NCIS team into the wild world of modern-day treasure hunting while Gibbs and Fornell get deeper into their search for the opioid kingpin.

Title: Sunburn
Synopsis: McGee and his wife Delilah's Bahamian vacation turns into a high-stakes mission when a case NCIS is tracking of a dead escape room manager has ties to the island while Gibbs fears the worst when his search for Fornell leads to blood.

Title: Head of the Snake
Synopsis: Gibbs and Fornell's crusade to find the head of the drug ring responsible for Fornell's daughter Emily's overdose concludes while Gibbs and Vance finally let the team in on a case that has dangerous implications.

Title: 1mm
Synopsis: Following a tip about smuggled weapons, Bishop and Torres engage in a shootout in a former sheriff's residence that's now a historical site, only to find themselves locked in abandoned cells there as Gibbs and McGee race to find them.

Title: The First Day
Synopsis: NCIS investigates the murder of a Navy officer who was killed while driving home a recently released inmate while Gibbs helps Palmer deal with a personal trauma.

Title: True Believer
Synopsis: When Sloane's name is discovered in Afghanistan at the site of an abandoned bus with a dead driver, Gibbs accompanies her on a trip to find a group of girls who were kidnapped from the bus while McGee, Bishop and Torres track down a hacker who emailed compromising information to the Taliban.

Title: Winter Chill
Synopsis: NCIS dives into the competitive world of food trucks after finding a man frozen to death in the back of one.

Title: Watchdog
Synopsis: NCIS uncovers a secret dogfighting ring which leads to an unexpected move by one of the team members.

Title: Gut Punch
Synopsis: Vance assigns McGee, Torres and Bishop to COVID compliance duty at a foreign affairs summit where they soon discover a link to a murder case another NCIS team is investigating.

Title: Sangre
Synopsis: Evidence from the stabbing of a Marine Sergeant leads Torres to reunite with his father, Miguel, who left when he was a child.

Title: Misconduct
Synopsis: While the team investigates a biker killed in a hit and run, Gibbs prepares to testify against a financial advisor who stole millions from his Navy clients.
Writers: Margaret Rose Lester & David J. North & Brendan Fehily

Title: Unseen Improvements
Synopsis: NCIS tracks a stolen laptop to the uncle of Phineas, Gibbs's former neighbor.

Title: Blown Away
Synopsis: When members of an NCIS Regional Enforcement Action Capabilities Training (REACT) Team are killed during an explosion while in the middle of a hostage situation involving a Navy Petty Officer Second Class, NCIS Special Agent Jessica Knight, the lone surviving member of the team temporarily joins the MCRT in hopes of uncovering the truth of what happened to her colleagues.

Title: Rule 91
Synopsis: As the NCIS team pursue a dangerous arms dealer, they're left shocked when Bishop is implicated in the leaking of highly classified NSA documents while Gibbs and Marcie realize the killer they've been tracking may be onto them.

Title: Blood in the Water
Synopsis: As the NCIS team search for Gibbs after wreckage from his boat is discovered, they find out he was tracking a serial killer with journalist Marcie Warren who wrote an exposé on him.

Title: Nearly Departed
Synopsis: While trying to find the serial killer Gibbs was after, the NCIS team discovers another person has been tracking the case as well.

Title: Road to Nowhere
Synopsis: As Gibbs and Parker go on a road trip to find one of the serial killer's victims, Knight goes undercover at a large manufacturing company with ties to the murders.

Title: Great Wide Open
Synopsis: Gibbs and McGee head to Alaska while the team works at home to uncover the conspiracy behind the serial killer with the case prompting Gibbs to make a life-changing decision.

Title: Face the Strange
Synopsis: The NCIS team investigate when a Navy Petty Officer is found dead in a grave but matters are complicated when the body explodes before Jimmy can examine it while Parker has to decide what to do with his life in the aftermath of being fired from the FBI.

Title: False Start
Synopsis: NCIS investigates when a beloved Navy Commander who trained some of the top athletes in the country is murdered.

Title: Docked
Synopsis: NCIS investigates the death of a man on a cruise ship whose body is discovered in the ship's sauna by none other than McGee's mother-in-law.

Title: Peacekeeper
Synopsis: NCIS investigates the case of a Navy reservist whose body is found in a beat-up car at the end of a gun range while Kasie weighs the pros and cons of buying a gun.

Title: Collective Memory
Synopsis: When a hotshot financial advisor is found shot dead at a naval station, the NCIS team investigate and even interview the victim's three-dimensional hologram of herself which she created before her death to determine a motive for the killing.

Title: Pledge of Allegiance
Synopsis: NCIS is called in when a Navy Chief Warrant Officer is suspected of trying to sell stolen classified Navy software used to pilot combat drones.

Title: All Hands
Synopsis: After a civilian research vessel in the North Atlantic picks up a small boat of wounded Navy officers, the team arrives on the ship and is forced to go into hiding after discovering terrorists are also on board while Knight takes a paper doll with her on the mission to capture photos for her niece's grade school class.

Title: Fight or Flight
Synopsis: When the body of a Navy Lieutenant is discovered missing an eye, the investigation leads the NCIS team to the world of cage fighting while Torres struggles with his feelings over the departure of his father, Bishop and Gibbs.

Title: The Helpers
Synopsis: While investigating the death of an intruder at Quantico, Jimmy and Kasie are exposed to a deadly biotoxin, trapping them in the lab. With time running out, the NCIS team calls on Doctor Carol Wilson for help as they race to find the antidote. As that goes on, Torres tries to distract Jimmy's daughter who came to the office to spend the day with her father.

Title: First Steps
Synopsis: As NCIS investigates the cause of death of a reservist Navy SEAL surgeon, they're forced to bring Vance's daughter, Kayla, who recently trained with NCIS, to help with a highly dangerous mission. However the case turns personal for Vance when Kayla is abducted, sending the team into a desperate race against time to find her before it's too late.

Title: Thick As Thieves
Synopsis: Parker's delinquent past resurfaces when NCIS is called to Philadelphia to investigate the death of a Navy petty officer.

Title: The Wake
Synopsis: A gruesome mishap at a Navy petty officer's gender-reveal party leads NCIS to the case of a missing teacher that was popularized on a true crime podcast.

Title: Starting Over
Synopsis: As NCIS investigates the suicide of a retired Navy Lieutenant Commander who was also a member of a grief group that Palmer and Knight attend, Torres receives a phone call from NCIS Hawaii Special Agent in Charge Jane Tennant regarding a lead on a case they worked on together.

Title: Last Dance
Synopsis: When an infamous arms dealer is released from prison and bodies start piling up, Torres has to face the repercussions of his actions during an undercover operation he worked on years ago.

Title: The Brat Pack
Synopsis: NCIS investigates a ring of clever teenage partygoers when a string of break-ins takes place at Marine Base Quantico. While working the case, McGee forms a bond with one of the teens.

Title: All or Nothing
Synopsis: NCIS investigates the unexpected death of a Navy reservist who was an investigative journalist while Knight and Jimmy's budding romance is put on hold when a vital organ transfer goes fatally wrong.

Title: Birds of a Feather
Synopsis: When Parker is framed for murder, the team puts their jobs on the line in order to buy time and uncover the truth.

Title: A Family Matter
Synopsis: With Parker and his ex-wife Vivian still on the run, the NCIS team investigate who from his past may have a personal vendetta in the hope of clearing Parker's name, enlisting the help of Jane Tennant, the Special Agent in Charge of the NCIS: Hawaii team, and her colleague Ernie Malik, NCIS Hawaii's computer specialist, both of whom are in town meeting with Vance during preparations for a global military exercise.

Title: Daddy Issues
Synopsis: When a man is found dead during a break-in at a government bunker, NCIS investigate while McGee finds himself struggling as his personal life and professional life collide with one another.

Title: Unearth
Synopsis: When a body is found at an ancient burial site that is thought to have a longstanding curse, the NCIS team tries to determine the motive and the symbolism behind the crime and as Torres continues therapy with Dr. Grace, he discovers both their lives are in great danger.

Title: Leave No Trace
Synopsis: When a Petty Officer is found dead in a campsite, the NCIS team investigate and find themselves working with an agent who's from the National Park Service Law Enforcement Rangers or United States Park Rangers and also an ex-boyfriend of Knight's.

Title: Guardian
Synopsis: When Vance is attacked during a home invasion, Parker steps in to defend his boss from any further attacks, with the two learning it's connected to an operation that Vance participated in six years ago while the team detects progress in Jessica and Jimmy's blossoming romance.

Title: The Good Fighter
Synopsis: When an NCIS agent turns up dead and Kasie goes unaccounted for, the team must work quickly to find the killer.

Title: Love Lost
Synopsis: When SECNAV Tara Flynn's husband arrives at the Navy Yard, stating she tried to kill him, the NCIS team find themselves reluctantly investigating SECNAV herself to determine if the claims are true.

Title: Turkey Trot
Synopsis: During protection detail for an Admiral at an annual Thanksgiving 5K, the NCIS team discover a man posing as an NCIS agent attempts to gain access and investigate when the float is destroyed with things growing intense when it's revealed the suspect wants revenge against one of their own.

Title: Higher Education
Synopsis: When a student running across the street dies in a hit-and-run, NCIS investigate, discovering the victim had highly-classified files on his laptop which in the wrong hands could compromise national security and who has connections to McGee's wife, Delilah.

Title: Too Many Cooks
Synopsis: Members of the NCIS teams in Los Angeles and Hawaii all descend on D.C. to attend the upcoming retirement party of a beloved professor and a former Marine who worked as an instructor at FLETC, only to find themselves working with their D.C. counterparts to investigate the circumstances of his shocking suicide.

Title: Bridges
Synopsis: As the NCIS team investigate the unusual murder of a Navy Ensign, Parker discovers he's become a victim of identity theft while Knight and Jimmy face hurdles in their relationship as their connection grows.

Title: Big Rig
Synopsis: When an old pal of Torres's comes to him for guidance, dishevelled and bloodied amidst an undercover FBI operation and then disappears, NCIS race to track him down before it's too late while McGee prepares to be a contestant on a popular game show.

Title: Evil Eye
Synopsis: As a world-renowned actress shadows the NCIS team in preparation for an upcoming role, they investigate a decapitation case which has them racing to track down and apprehend a serial killer who's targeting people with heterochromia.

Title: Old Wounds
Synopsis: When a Navy officer who was transporting millions of dollars worth of opioids is murdered, the team investigate while Parker struggles with his emotions when it's revealed that a conman he was after in the past is now a prime suspect.

Title: Unusual Suspects
Synopsis: NCIS investigates when a ride-share driver is found dead after a car accident while Parker's father who is temporarily living with him helps the team with the case.

Title: Butterfly Effect
Synopsis: When a potential biological terrorist attack occurs in the parking garage of a strip mall, NCIS investigate while Knight struggles as her father in Japan deals with a health scare.

Title: Stranger in a Strange Land
Synopsis: NCIS works to solve the murder of a Marine Private who appears to have been murdered for helping an Afghan refugee with the investigation leading them to a violent white supremacist group while Jimmy navigates the pressure of parenting his daughter who's eager to go out on an unchaperoned group date.

Title: Head Games
Synopsis: The NCIS team digs deep to investigate a Navy Lieutenant who's accused of trying to murder her husband but has no memory of the attack while Kasie navigates a potential medical scare.

Title: In the Spotlight
Synopsis: As Knight goes viral for saving a mother and her young son from a potentially fatal car accident, the NCIS team investigate and discover it's connected to an ongoing DEA case.

Title: Second Opinion
Synopsis: As NCIS works to solve the murder of a Senator's daughter and a Navy Petty officer who had a rebellious reputation and large online following, Jimmy finds himself getting competitive with an old college rival who's also working on the case.

Title: Kompromat
Synopsis: When a suspicious murder occurs in the classified section of the National Archive, NCIS investigates and discovers that a group of Russian spies who they exposed and arrested over the last year might be linked to the crime while Jimmy accidentally makes a confession that could change the course of his relationship with Knight.

Title: Black Sky
Synopsis: After learning of an impending terrorist attack, the NCIS team race to stop it from occurring on U.S. soil with Torres going undercover at a prison.

Title: Algún Día
Synopsis: The NCIS team must help Torres when he puts his future at stake by confronting the man who tormented his family when he was a child.

Title: The Stories We Leave Behind
Synopsis: As NCIS mourns the loss of Ducky, the agents find comfort in working on one of his unfinished cases involving a young woman whose father was dishonorably discharged from the Marines.

Title: Lifeline
Synopsis: When the NCIS team engages in Walk-a-Mile day to gain a new perspectives on different departments, things take a turn when Kasie receives a distress call from a mysterious man.

Title: Left Unsaid
Synopsis: When an officer goes missing during his wedding proposal, the NCIS team race against time to find him before it's too late.

Title: The Plan
Synopsis: With the help of Knight's father, the NCIS team work to unravel the mystery of a recently-used service weapon belonging to a missing agent while McGee is in a tailspin when DNA results reveal a close relative he was unaware of.

Title: Strange Invaders
Synopsis: After discovering a navy pilot's body riddled with unusual wounds, NCIS's investigation draws the team into the rabbit hole of UFO conspiracy theories.
Writers: Gina Gold & Aurorae Khoo & Steve D. Binder

Title: A Thousand Yards
Synopsis: While at his wife's graveside, Vance is shot and wounded, sending the NCIS team on a race to find out who's responsible with the team soon discovering it's connected to a case that retired NCIS Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs worked on twenty years ago as Vance tries to mend fences with his estranged son, Jared.

Title: Heartless
Synopsis: The NCIS team looks for a motive behind the kidnapping and death of a famous heart surgeon.

Title: Prime Cut
Synopsis: After discovering the remains of a Marine captain, Torres and Knight head to Texas to interrogate the suspected killer.

Title: Reef Madness
Synopsis: Parker and Knight discover three bodies on an old Navy ship that's about to be sunk and turned into an artificial reef when they're suddenly locked inside by a mysterious figure while Vance offers Knight a unique opportunity.

Title: Empty Nest
Synopsis: NCIS searches for a missing undercover agent in the midst of an active hostage situation.

Title: Foreign Bodies
Synopsis: As Vance prepares to host diplomatic talks with Venezuela, the team is called in to investigate the dead body of one of his inside men.

Title: The Trouble with Hal
Synopsis: NCIS is called in to investigate when a lieutenant returns home on the eve of Halloween to find a surprise party being thrown for someone else at his place.

Title: Sticks & Stones
Synopsis: After receiving intelligence on deadly threats to multiple locations that could lead to a catastrophic war, NCIS is called in to try to neutralize the danger.

Title: In From The Cold
Synopsis: NCIS works with the CIA to discover what secrets are being kept by Captain Butler, an aging former spy.

Title: Knight & Day
Synopsis: Things become tense when Knight is assigned to protect the wife of a high-level defense contractor when their home is attacked.

Title: Hardboiled
Synopsis: Torres receives intel from a confidential informant regarding top secret naval information that’s at risk of being sold.

Title: Out of Control
Synopsis: NCIS investigates a murder related to a car that begins driving on its own while Parker is still seeing visions of Lily.

Title: Humbug
Synopsis: When a shocking tell-all threatens to ruin Christmas for a decorated Marine, NCIS must uncover the truth and deliver a holiday machine - before the book hits the shelves and turns a hero's legacy into a holiday disaster.

Title: Baker's Man
Synopsis: After NCIS learns that the owner of Parker's favorite bakery is being blackmailed, they hatch a plan to save her from the perpetrators while tensions heighten when Torres's secret romance is discovered.
